== Bharanikkavu (CT) (628290) ==

Bharanikkavu (CT) is a town in the [[Mavelikkara]] taluka of [[Alappuzha]] district with an area of 10.34 sq. km. and harbouring 4276 households with total population of 15922 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Alappuzha]] is at a distance of 40 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 125 km. Male population is 7265 and female population is 8657. Scheduled Caste population is 2563 and Scheduled Tribes population is 22. Census Location Code of the town is 628290<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Alappuzha (m + og) at a distance of 40 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 109 km. Railway station is at Mavelikkara at a distance of 10 km.
